name: LD50_Pyre
description:
This is Ludum Dare: Delay the inevitable.

What is inevitable, then?

Loneliness?

Death?

Or… a dying ember?

------

This game is about how to delay a dying ember's death and how to save your own life.

Somehow, fire are just like people: we are eager

we are what's left of our desire.

And we burn it.

We are burning pyres.

--------

Tutorial

Click on the item to pick up

Click on the pyre to add this item as fuel

Sometimes you need to save the ember

By continuously Clicking the pyre.

Clickable objects have outline.

Sometimes, you can click on yourself.
